api.name: ObServiceNavigationComponent
api.usage: The ObServiceNavigationComponent provides an area to display widgets. It is directly integrated in the ObMasterLayout but could also be used independently, in which case the ObHeadersControlsModule needs to be imported. A collection of widgets is readily available (PAMS login, PAMS, logout, PAMS profile, PAMS messages, application info and language selection) and each one can be independently displayed. It is also possible to provide custom widgets.

inputs.name: profileLinks
inputs.text: Custom list of ObIHeaderControlLinks. This list of profile links will be displayed inside the profile widget's panel.

inputs.name: infoLinks
inputs.text: Custom list of ObIHeaderControlLinks. This list of info links will be displayed inside the info widget's panel.

inputs.name: infoContact
inputs.text: Configures your custom contact information. This custom contact information will be displayed inside the info widget's panel.

inputs.name: maxLastUsedApplications
inputs.text: Sets the maximum of last-used applications that will be listed inside the application widget's panel. This list is sent by PAMS and is linked to the registered user's profile.

inputs.name: maxFavoriteApplications
inputs.text: Sets the maximum of favorite applications that will be listed inside the application widget's panel. This list is sent by PAMS and is linked to the registered user's profile.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.text: Will be used to compute the environment from which the PAMS data will be loaded. If no environment is provided, the ObServiceNavigationComponent won't make any backend call.

inputs.name: rootUrl
inputs.text: The root URL for backend calls. If provided, it takes precedence over the one computed from the environment.

inputs.name: returnUrl
inputs.text: URL to which users will be redirected after successful authentication.

inputs.name: displayMessage
inputs.text: Determines whether the message widget is displayed or not.

inputs.name: displayInfo
inputs.text: Determines whether the info widget is displayed or not.

inputs.name: displayApplications
inputs.text: Determines whether the applications widget is displayed or not.

inputs.name: displayProfile
inputs.text: Determines whether the profile widget is displayed or not.

inputs.name: displayAuthentication
inputs.text: Determines whether the authentication widget is displayed or not.

inputs.name: displayLanguages
inputs.text: Determines whether the languages widget is displayed or not.

methods.name: changeLanguage
methods.text: Changes the language of the TranslateService to the given value.

variables.name: email
variables.text: Property that defines the email address of the contact information.

variables.name: tel
variables.text: Property to defines the telephone number of a contact information.

variables.name: url
variables.text: This property will be translated and applied to the href attribute of a link in the profile widget's panel.

variables.name: label
variables.text: This property will be translated and used as the label of a link in the profile widget's panel.
